name: gettext-parser
description: Parse and compile gettext po and mo files to/from json, nothing more, nothing less
author: Andris Reinman

scripts.test-generate-mo: msgfmt test/fixtures/latin13.po -o test/fixtures/latin13.mo & msgfmt test/fixtures/utf8.po -o test/fixtures/utf8.mo & msgfmt test/fixtures/obsolete.po -o test/fixtures/obsolete.mo
